column5: BCLI streaming ended with big announcement is they have been invited to the white house on a possible policy change thats what the host said not sure how it will relate to BCLI or ALS community guess we all have to stay tuned
BCLI big announcement is they have been invited to the white house
BCLI The host keeps talking about the big announcement but he keeps bailing on dude this isnt a PBS special what is the announcement overall streaming is ok lots of glitches but good idea
BCLI Streaming news event on No More Excuses FDA and ALSA Protest on FB Ask to be addedthey will approve you All footage will be saved

BCLI What we need is actually not the coverage on the protest What we need is a PR from BCLIs management on any concessions won with the FDA that will speed up the approval of NurOwn Thats what will move the SP For example the FDA were the ones to invite Mitsubishi Tanabe to submit an NDA for approval of Radicava Thats the kind of concession we need to hear about THEREs ABSOLUTELY NO REASON NUROWN SHOUDNT BE GIVEN ACCELERATED APPROVAL BASED ON THAT P2 DATA

BCLI anyone find coverage of the protest got the links but NOTHING maybe im not looking in the right spot do i have to be a member for all the hype im getting disappointed in the lack of coverage thus far
